item.title: Zero to Om - Act 4
item.description: Until now the application is rather boring. It just displays data. But we want to actually use it! In this post we will take a look at how the app reacts (no pun intented) to user input. The source code can be found on GitHub. Note: I strongly recommend reading the previous post first if you haven’t done so already. Managing state is tricky. Each framework has its own mechanisms to detect and handle state changes.
